# Blood Tide (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] ([[Necrophagy Spells|necrophagy]])

**Level:** [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Components:** V

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5ft./2 levels)

**Target:** 1 living creature

**Duration:** 1d4 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 133

When you cast this spell, the targeted creature begins bleeding from its nose, eyes, ears, and mouth. This bleeding causes no damage but imposes a â€“2 penalty on all Intelligence-, Charisma-, and Wisdom-based checks while in effect.

A bleeding creature might also inadvertently attract the attention of creatures such as [[Stirge (Bestiary PF1)|stirges]], [[Shark (Bestiary PF1)|sharks]], or giant mosquitoes, depending on the circumstances.

A *[[Cure Light Wounds (Spell)|cure light wounds]]* or DC 10 [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] check can stop the bleeding created by this spell.
